name: routest-to-swagger
description: turn routest definition into a swagger file

scripts.build:lib:clean: npm run clean:lib && npm run build:lib
scripts.build:bin:clean: npm run clean:bin && npm run build:bin
scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/babel -d build/ *.js && npm run build:lib && npm run build:bin
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build

author: evan short < evan@sdicg.com >
